name: Mamoré: The Untold Story
description:
Interdisciplinary work for Game Design course at Anhembi Morumbi University (2021/1).  I've made all the narrative, I've worked as a producer, programmed with João Gozzi all the game scripts, and I've done some part of the art like some elements in the HUD and I've done some 3D objects.

Co-produced with Alexandre Rugolo, Gustavo Martins, Ígor Cabral, João Gozzi and Vitor Fortes and Yann Costa.
